sql.content: UPDATE TProcess SET nextProcessID = ':previous.nextProcessID' ,nextActivityID = ':previous.nextActivityID' ,nextActivityCode = ':previous.nextActivityCode' ,nextActivityName = ':previous.nextActivityName' ,operateTime = ':previous.operateTime.fullMilli' ,operateTimeLen = :previous.operateTimeLen ,operateTypeID = ':previous.operateTypeID' ,operateType = ':previous.operateType' ,operateUserID = ':previous.operateUserID' ,operateUser = ':previous.operateUser' ,operateOrgID = ':previous.operateOrgID' ,operateOrg = ':previous.operateOrg' ,summary = ':previous.summary' ,summaryPass = ':previous.summaryPass' ,counter = ':previous.counter' ,counterPass = ':previous.counterPass' ,passType = ':previous.passType' WHERE processID = ':previous.processID'
sql.comment: 更新前一个工作流流转过程

sql.content: UPDATE TProcess SET nextProcessID = ':previous.nextProcessID' ,nextActivityID = ':previous.nextActivityID' ,nextActivityCode = ':previous.nextActivityCode' ,nextActivityName = ':previous.nextActivityName' ,operateTime = ':previous.operateTime.fullMilli' ,operateTimeLen = :previous.operateTimeLen ,operateTypeID = ':previous.operateTypeID' ,operateType = ':previous.operateType' ,operateUserID = ':previous.operateUserID' ,operateUser = ':previous.operateUser' ,operateOrgID = ':previous.operateOrgID' ,operateOrg = ':previous.operateOrg' ,summary = ':previous.summary' ,summaryPass = ':previous.summaryPass' ,counter = ':previous.counter' ,counterPass = ':previous.counterPass' ,passType = ':previous.passType' WHERE splitProcessID = ':previous.splitProcessID' AND previousOperateTypeID = 'RT003' AND (nextProcessID IS NULL OR nextProcessID = '')
sql.comment: 分单多路后的汇总，汇总节点向下一节点流转时，更新之前所有汇总流转路由

sql.content: UPDATE TProcess SET nextProcessID = 'FLOW-SYSTEM' ,nextActivityID = 'FLOW-SYSTEM' ,nextActivityCode = 'FLOW-SYSTEM' ,nextActivityName = 'FLOW-SYSTEM' ,operateTime = ':process.operateTime.fullMilli' ,operateTimeLen = 0 ,operateTypeID = 'RT004' ,operateType = '汇签关闭' ,operateUserID = 'FLOW-SYSTEM' ,operateUser = 'FLOW-SYSTEM' ,operateOrgID = '' ,operateOrg = '' WHERE splitProcessID = ':process.splitProcessID' AND previousOperateTypeID != 'RT003' AND (nextProcessID IS NULL OR nextProcessID = '')
sql.comment: 分单多路后的汇总，在汇总条件满足时，将未执行的其它路由更新系统关闭

sql.content: SELECT SUM(A.summary) AS summary ,MAX(A.summaryPass) AS summaryPass ,SUM(A.counter) AS counter ,MAX(A.counterPass) AS counterPass ,MAX(A.passType) AS passType FROM TProcess A WHERE A.splitProcessID = ':splitProcessID' AND A.operateTypeID = 'RT003' <[ AND A.workID = ':workID' ]> <[ AND A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]>
sql.comment: 用于流转时，判定是否满足了汇总条件

sql.content: SELECT A.processID ,A.workID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.splitProcessID ,A.processNo ,A.currentActivityID ,A.currentActivityCode ,A.currentActivityName ,A.previousProcessID ,A.previousActivityID ,A.previousActivityCode ,A.previousActivityName ,A.previousOperateTypeID ,A.nextProcessID ,A.nextActivityID ,A.nextActivityCode ,A.nextActivityName ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.summary ,A.summaryPass ,A.counter ,A.counterPass ,A.passType ,A.limitUserID ,A.limitOrgID ,A.limitTime ,A.operateTime ,A.operateTimeLen ,A.operateTypeID ,A.operateType ,A.operateUserID ,A.operateUser ,A.operateOrgID ,A.operateOrg ,A.operateFiles ,A.operateDatas ,A.infoComment FROM TProcess A WHERE A.operateTypeID = 'RT003' <[ AND A.workID = ':workID' ]> <[ AND A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> ORDER BY A.createTime DESC ,A.operateTime DESC
